description: This is a Python source file defining a workflow class for startup idea validation, including multiple agents for idea clarification, market research, competitor analysis, and report generation. It also contains class definitions for data models and a script entry point for interactive use.

classes.name: IdeaClarification
classes.description: Data model representing the clarification of a startup idea, including originality, mission, and objectives.

classes.name: MarketResearch
classes.description: Data model representing market research data such as TAM, SAM, SOM, and target customer segments.

classes.name: StartupIdeaValidator
classes.description: Workflow class orchestrating the startup idea validation process using multiple AI agents.

methods.name: get_idea_clarification
methods.description: Uses the idea clarifier agent to generate a clarification and assessment of the startup idea.

methods.name: get_market_research
methods.description: Uses the market research agent to estimate market sizes and target segments based on the idea and clarification.

methods.name: get_competitor_analysis
methods.description: Uses the competitor analysis agent to identify competitors and perform SWOT analysis.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Main method that executes the workflow: clarifies the idea, performs market research, competitor analysis, and generates a final report.
